Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Arrogant_00>I'll dig all day every day if <clr:0000>marbled rock
roast<clr:ffff>'s the reward.

But no matter how much I dig, I keep
finding stuff I don't understand. And
none of it tastes good.
Time to cleanse the ol' palate with more
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>!
Talk_03:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>If those things that showed up around
here really are vehicles...

then maybe they were used by our most
noble ancestors!

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Still, if something was gonna turn up, I'd rather it
were ore instead...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hey, friend. You don't look like you're
part of YunoboCo.<sp:5:1:0>

Oh, <sp:5:0:0>are you with the Zonai Survey Team?
You here to check out the weird vehicle
things around here?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Arrogant_00>No matter how much I dig, I keep finding
stuff I don't understand. And none of
it tastes good.
So I'm cleanin' my palate with this
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>. It's the only thing
worth eatin' these days.
